name: Bandersnatch: Visual Novel Version
description:
My submission for nanoreno 2023!

I know it's bad, and could use more work, I might get back to it. Who knows.

Assets by Nanoreko Games and another guy (I'm sorry I forgot to write down your URL)

my second visual novel ever, based on the Netflix interactive movie Black Mirror: Bandersnatch

Go watch it, it's way better than this visual novel adaptation
